title: IS HYPNOSIS SAFE? / Q&A with Dr. Marco Paret
description:
Dr. Marco Paret will answer the question "Is hypnosis safe?". He's been working in the field of non-verbal hypnosis for more than 25 years. He is teaching the ancient techniques of Mesmerism & Fascination in modern times. After so many years of researches, Dr. Paret is willing to share his knowledge. Watch the whole video and don't miss any of his secrets. In this video, you can also see some of his incredible non-verbal hypnosis demonstrations, that were captured with his students on his masterclasses. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
